textTemplates.name: CGH_YP_Email
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!$Record.litify_pm__First_Name__c},

You previously signed our retainer agreement to have a further look at your {!$Record.Case_Type_Name_del__c} case. Our prosecuting firm has been unable to reach you and it's crucial you contact them if you want to pursue potentially getting a cash settlement. If you can please reach out to Attorney, Brian, directly at 601-326-0820 or Olivia at 601-326-0898, they need to speak with you to be able to further pursue the case. 

All the best,
Young & Partners Law
{!$Organization.Phone}

textTemplates.name: Chaffin_YP_Email
textTemplates.text:
{!$Record.litify_pm__First_Name__c},

We hope this message finds you well. We wanted to follow up regarding your {!$Record.Case_Type_Name_del__c} case, for which you previously signed our retainer agreement. Unfortunately, our prosecuting firm has been unsuccessful in reaching you, and it is essential that you contact them promptly if you wish to proceed with the possibility of obtaining a settlement. To move forward with your case, we kindly request that you reach out to Chaffin Luhana at 888-480-1123. Their team needs to speak with you to discuss further steps in pursuing your case.

If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to us at Young & Partners Law Firm by calling 888-427-9607 as well. Thank you. 

All the best,
Saddle Rock Legal Group
888-427-9607

textTemplates.name: SendEmail_SRLG_9607
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!$Record.litify_pm__First_Name__c},

<br><br>

You previously signed our retainer agreement to have a further look at your {!$Record.Case_Type_Name_del__c} case. Our prosecuting firm has been unable to reach you and it's crucial you contact them if you want to pursue potentially getting a cash settlement. If you can please reach out to our partnering firm, {!$Record.Referral_Partner_Name__c}, at {!$Record.Referral_Partner_Phone__c}, they need to speak with you to be able to further pursue the case. 

<br><br>

If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to us at Saddle Rock Legal Group by calling 888-427-9607 as well. Thank you.

Best regards,

Saddle Rock Legal Group

888-427-9607

textTemplates.name: Whitley_YP_Email
textTemplates.text:
{!$Record.litify_pm__First_Name__c},

We hope this message finds you well. We wanted to follow up regarding your {!$Record.Case_Type_Name_del__c} case, for which you previously signed our retainer agreement. Unfortunately, our prosecuting firm has been unsuccessful in reaching you, and it is essential that you contact them promptly if you wish to proceed with the possibility of obtaining a settlement. To move forward with your case, we kindly request that you reach out to Whitley Law Firm at 919-785-5000. Their team needs to speak with you to discuss further steps in pursuing your case.

If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to us at Young & Partners Law Firm by calling 888-427-9607 as well. Thank you. 

All the best,
Young & Partners Law Firm
888-427-9607
